title: Introduction to Programming
details: Learn the basics of programming using popular languages like Python and Java.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
details: Comprehensive training on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular web frameworks.

title: Data Science Fundamentals
details: Explore the basics of data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

title: Graphic Design Mastery
details: Unlock your creativity with in-depth lessons on graphic design principles and tools.

title: Mobile App Development
details: Build mobile apps for iOS and Android using Swift, Kotlin, and Flutter.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
details: Learn the fundamentals of cybersecurity, ethical hacking, and threat mitigation.

title: Business Analytics Workshop
details: Gain insights into business data analytics, decision-making, and reporting.

title: Public Speaking Mastery
details: Improve your public speaking skills, overcome anxiety, and captivate your audience.

title: Yoga and Mindfulness
details: Explore the benefits of yoga and mindfulness for physical and mental well-being.
